text:
Stash Invest is hiring developers: Front-End, Back-end & Full-Stack.

Stash is on a mission to simplify and democratize investing. We provide guidance, and help investors learn the basics so they can do it themselves with as little as $5.

At Stash we look for bar-raisers who inspire others around them to step up their game, and we are building a data-driven culture that values evidence over ego. If you are enthusiastic about building, deploying and maintaining large-scale, javascript-driven web applications, and you enjoy solving hard problems, Stash may be the company for you!

https://www.stashinvest.com/careers
